```{r read_data}
file_path <- './Dataset/braking.csv'
braking_data <- read.csv(file_path)
str(braking_data)
```

```{r mutate_unit}
braking_data <- braking_data %>%
  mutate(speed_kmh = speed * 1.60934) %>%
  mutate(dist_m = dist * 0.3048)

head(braking_data)

```
```{r separate_data}
set.seed(1)
train_ind <- sample(1:50, size = 50 * 0.8)

braking_data_train <- braking_data[train_ind,]
braking_data_test <- braking_data[-train_ind,]
```


```{r plot_data_point}
data_plot <- ggplot(data = braking_data_train, aes(x=speed_kmh, y=dist_m)) +
  geom_point(color = "black", alpha = 0.3)

data_plot

```

# Linear Regression

```{r cal_b0_b1}
b1 <- sum((braking_data_train$speed_kmh - mean(braking_data_train$speed_kmh)) * (braking_data_train$dist_m - mean(braking_data_train$dist_m))) /
  sum((braking_data_train$speed_kmh - mean(braking_data_train$speed_kmh))^2)
b0 <- mean(braking_data_train$dist_m) - b1 * mean(braking_data_train$speed_kmh)
```

```{r verify_pedastrain}
model <- lm(braking_data_train$dist_m ~ braking_data_train$speed_kmh)
coefficients <- coef(model)
b0_lm <- coefficients[1]
b1_lm <- coefficients[2]
r_2_lm <- summary(model)$r.squared
```

```{r cal_R^2}
predict_dist_m = b0 + b1 * braking_data_train$speed_kmh
ESS <- sum((predict_dist_m - mean(braking_data_train$dist_m))^2)
TSS <- sum((mean(braking_data_train$dist_m) - braking_data_train$dist_m)^2)
r_2 <- ESS / TSS
```


```{r show_lr_result}
data_plot +
  geom_abline(aes(slope = b1, intercept = b0, col = "SLR" ), show.legend = FALSE) +
  scale_colour_manual(name = "Model fit", values = c("red", "blue"))

```
